CALICE::TriggerHistory

CALICE::TriggerHistory Class Reference

Utility class to chech the zero suppressed trigger history which will be atteched to the lcio event. More...

Detailed Description

Utility class to chech the zero suppressed trigger history which will be atteched to the lcio event.

Author:
G. Gaycken LLR

Definition at line 23 of file TriggerHistory.hh.

Member Function Documentation

unsigned int CALICE::TriggerHistory::cleanUntil ( int  length_in_ns,
unsigned int  trigger_bit_mask 
) const [inline]

Return the position with in the given range where there is trigger activity.

Parameters:
length_in_ns the range of the trigger fifo in ns which should reflect inactivity.
trigger_bit_mask a bit mask of all the trigger bits which indicate activity.
Returns:
the position in the fifo where there is trigger activity. If there is no trigger activity in the given range then zero is returned. Note: it is not verified whether the main word is far enough away from the corresponding end of the fifo.
